name: Just About Life
description:
A game based upon an experience from these strange times.

Controls for walking WASD
Interact with left mouse button

Game length: 5 - 10 minutes
Made By:
-  Programming by Emma Rose van der Hoek
- 3D models & room design by Shanice de Jong
- Game design by Shanice de Jong & Emma Rose van der Hoek
- Audio by Bas Boudewijn

External Models - Couch & Armchair
- Mannequin
- Presents
- Bench
- Picknick table
- Fence
